ComicInfo.Characters: Katchoo,Ms. Olivia Feinstein,David Qin,Francine Peters,Gym Trainer Monica,Director Joe
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T15:47:04 [Issue ID 4000-178791] urn:comicvine:4000-178791 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 11:08:48. [Issue ID 59841]
ComicInfo.Summary: Francine decides to take action about her body shape and finds working out before work is not such a great idea. An accident on the way to work ruins Francine's outfit and is forced to wear something from a commercial shoot at work with unexpected results. Katchoo sees too much of his sister in David and reveals the meaning behind her rose tattoo.
ComicInfo.Title: She Has Reasons
